item.title: Teaching the model: Designing LLM feedback loops that get smarter over time
item.description: How to close the loop between user behavior and LLM performance, and why human-in-the-loop systems are still essential in the age of gen AI.

item.title: This researcher turned OpenAI’s open weights model gpt-oss-20b into a non-reasoning ‘base’ model with less alignment, more freedom
item.description: Morris found it could also reproduce verbatim passages from copyrighted works, including three out of six book excerpts he tried.

item.title: That ‘cheap’ open-source AI model is actually burning through your compute budget
item.description: New research reveals open-source AI models use up to 10 times more computing resources than closed alternatives, potentially negating cost advantages ...

item.title: Gartner: GPT-5 is here, but the infrastructure to support true agentic AI isn’t (yet)
item.description: While OpenAI’s GPT-5 is highly-performant, capable and an important step forward, it features just faint glimmers of true agentic AI.

item.title: Google unveils ultra-small and efficient open source AI model Gemma 3 270M that can run on smartphones
item.description: For enterprise teams and commercial developers, this means the model can be embedded in products or fine-tuned.
